name: Pichu
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
